name: Haywire (334)
description:
Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Click to open and move through dialogue.

Defeat the boss to win!

Hint: Check out the pillars ;)

Also, since projectile type is randomly chosen it may take a while for the pillar-destroying projectiles to spawn.

First actual Unity game - made for Mini Jam 48. Enjoy this wonderful mess. Music is curtesy of Adam Haynes (https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjvrRp5J06REgUd91u8Xl3Q) Sprites and stuff were simply found online. Don't walk away while the dialogue box is up or it may get stuck.
